parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the final drive bearing can cause loss of control, accidents, or leave the driver stranded, potentially resulting in serious injury or death.
symptoms: Unusual noises or vibrations from the rear of the motorcycle
wobbling or shaking of the rear wheel
oil leaking from the final drive unit
and unstable side-to-side motion of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ball Pin Failure in Gear Shift Linkage
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ball pin in the gear shift linkage can cause the gear shift to become limp, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Broken ball pin in the gear shift linkage
and difficulty or inability to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive can cause a loss of control, reduced braking power, and instability, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Oil leaking on the rear wheel and tire

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause a loss of braking power, leading to accidents or injuries.
The failure of the final drive seal can cause the final drive lubricant to drip onto the rear brake caliper assembly, compromising rear tire traction and leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Final drive lubricant dripping onto the rear brake caliper assembly
rear tire coated with final drive lubricant.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear drive bearing can cause the final drive to fail, leading to a loss of power and control, which can result in accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: Loud noise from the final drive
